summary.para: Contains all common classes that WinForms TreeMap Control, WPF TreeMap Control, and WinForms Sunburst Control require to function.
The base interface for the treemap and sunburst items.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.IHierarchicalItem.Children
member.value: A collection of items that implement the IHierarchicalItem interface.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.IHierarchicalItem.Label

summary.para: Returns a label for the item.

member.value: An object that represents the item label.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.IHierarchicalItem.Tag

summary.para: Returns the object that contains data related to the item.

member.value: A that contains data about the chart element.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.IHierarchicalItem.Value
member.value: A floating-point number that defines the item value.

summary.para: The base interface for sunburst items.
The interface that should be implemented by a class which can be used as a tree map item.
Initializes a new instance of the class with specified settings.
